snippet: The T.S.A. plans to expand its PreCheck program, which allows certain “known and trusted” travelers expedited passage through security checkpoints.
abstract: Joe Sharkey On the Road column; Transportation Security Administration plans to expand its PreCheck program, which allows certain 'known and trusted' travelers expedited passage through security checkpoints.
lead_paragraph: The T.S.A. plans to expand its PreCheck program, which allows certain “known and trusted” travelers expedited passage through security checkpoints.

headline.print_headline: Expanding Elite Status To the Security Line
headline.seo: Security Check Programs Tend to Create an Elite Class - On the Road
headline.main: Expanding Elite Status to the Security Line
